description.english: Escape the MS Undeliverable
description.french: Échappe-toi de l'Indélivrable
description.german: Verdrück' Dich von der 'Unzustellbar'
description.italian: Scappa dal Battello Postale 'Irrecapitabile'
description.spanish: Escapa del Irrepartible

description.english: Meet the denizens of the Toff Races
description.french: Rencontre les habitués des courses de Sang-bleus
description.german: Triff' die Zocker bei den Blaublütlerrennen
description.italian: Incontra i partecipanti della Formula Nobile
description.spanish: Conoce a los jugadores de las apuestas de las Carreras Sangreazul

description.english: Make sure everyone's a winner
description.french: Fais en sorte que tout le monde gagne
description.german: Lasse jeden mal gewinnen
description.italian: Fai vincere almeno una volta tutti i nobili
description.spanish: Asegúrate de que todo el mundo gane

displayName.french: Mais dans quoi est-ce que tu t'embarques ?!
displayName.spanish: Viento en popa a toda vela

description.english: Join the Merchant Navy
description.french: Rejoins la marine marchande
description.german: Heuere bei der Handelsmarine an
description.italian: Unisciti alla Marina Mercantile
description.spanish: Únete a la Marina Mercante

description.english: Make the lookout see a harmless tug boat
description.french: Fais en sorte que la vigie voit un inoffensif remorqueur
description.german: Lasse den Ausguck einen harmlosen Schlepper sehen
description.italian: Fai in modo che la vedetta avvisti un innocuo rimorchiatore
description.spanish: Haz ver al vigía un pequeño e inocente barco carguero

description.english: Wrap your ears around all of Spry's groove
description.french: Écoute attentivement le groove de Solomon Spry jusqu'au bout
description.german: Höre dem Singstein mal genau zu
description.italian: Ascolta tutte le melodie di Lucio Cantarella
description.spanish: Déjate envolver por el encanto de Serralapiedra.

description.english: Catalogue all the stolen goods
description.french: Fais l'inventaire de tous les biens volés
description.german: Finde das gesamte Diebesgut
description.italian: Passa in rassegna tutti gli oggetti rubati
description.spanish: Investiga todos los bienes robados

description.english: Trounce Moses Melly first time around
description.french: Bats Moïse Melly à plate couture du premier coup
description.german: Schlage Moses Melly im ersten Versuch
description.italian: Straccia Melly al primo tentativo
description.spanish: Vence a Melly a la primera

description.english: When two seashells come together
description.french: Quand deux coquillages ne font qu'un
description.german: Wenn zwei Muscheln miteinander nuscheln
description.italian: Ci voglio due conchiglie per fare un mollusco
description.spanish: Si dos caracolas oyen las olas...

description.english: Keep your eyes peeled in Chinatown
description.french: Garde les yeux bien ouverts à Chinatown
description.german: Halte in Chinatown die Augen offen
description.italian: Non farti scappare l'umorismo di Chinatown
description.spanish: Mantén los ojos abiertos en Chinatown

description.english: Become an aromatic master manipulator
description.french: Deviens un maître de la manipulation aromatique
description.german: Werde ein Meister der Duftmanipulation
description.italian: Diventa un'abile manipolatrice di aromi
description.spanish: Conviértete en un experto de la aromaterapia

description.english: Don't forget to return what you borrow
description.french: N'oublie pas de rendre ce que tu as emprunté
description.german: Vergiss nicht zurückzugeben was Du Dir geliehen hast
description.italian: Non dimenticare di restituire ciò che non è tuo
description.spanish: No olvides devolver lo que te han prestado

description.english: Track down Widebeard's Fowl Fleet
description.french: Localise l'armée de volatiles de Grandebarbe
description.german: Stöbere Breitbarts Geflügelarmee auf
description.italian: Individua la flotta di pennuti del Barone Barbalarga
description.spanish: Localiza y persigue la Flota Avícola de Barbancha

description.english: Shoot down all the varmints on your first attempt
description.french: Tire sur toutes les vermines du premier coup
description.german: Treffe alle Schurkengesichter im ersten Anlauf
description.italian: Colpisci tutti i banditi al primo tentativo
description.spanish: Dispara a todos los villanos a la primera

description.english: Interview the head Ptarmigan's supporter
description.french: Parle au support du chef des lagopèdes
description.german: Sprich mit dem Hauptunterstützer der Schneehühner
description.italian: Parla con il trespolo vivente del capo delle Pernici
description.spanish: Habla con el cabecilla de la rebelión de las perdices nivales

description.english: Take an interest in Gloomholm's deceased citizens
description.french: Intéresse-toi aux citoyens décédés de Gloomholm
description.german: Interessiere Dich für die Verblichenen von Gloomholm
description.italian: Omaggia i sepolti di Leccioscuro
description.spanish: Muestra interés por los ciudadanos fallecidos de Gloomholm

description.english: Fulfil an ancient prophecy
description.french: Remplis une ancienne prophétie
description.german: Erfülle eine alte Prophezeiung
description.italian: Completa l'antica profezia
description.spanish: Cumple una antigua profecía

description.english: Find out what Sebastian thinks about 20 characters
description.french: Demande à Sébastien ce qu'il pense de 20 personnages différents
description.german: Finde heraus was Jürgen über 20 Personen denkt
description.italian: Ascolta l'opinione di Sebastian su 20 personaggi
description.spanish: Descubre qué piensa Sebastián sobre 20 personajes

description.english: Recruit an unexpected crewmember
description.french: Recrute un membre d'équipage inattendu
description.german: Rekrutiere unerwartet ein neues Mitglied der Crew
description.italian: Recruta a sopresa un nuovo membro dell'equipaggio
description.spanish: Enrola a un miembro inesperado en la tripulación

description.english: Unlock all achievements in Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet
description.french: Déverrouille tous les succès dans Nelly Cootalot : The Fowl Fleet
description.german: Erreiche alle Errungenschaften in Nelly Cootalot - The Fowl Fleet
description.italian: Sblocca tutti gli achievement di Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los logros en Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet
